---
title: "Selecting_Variables"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)

house_prices <- read_csv("data/train.csv")

selected_var <- house_prices %>% 
  mutate(TotalBath = BsmtFullBath + 
           BsmtHalfBath + 
           HalfBath + 
           FullBath) %>% 
  select(Id,GarageCars,BedroomAbvGr,TotalBath, BldgType, LotArea, Neighborhood, KitchenQual,PavedDrive, TotalBsmtSF, Electrical, OverallQual,ExterQual, YearBuilt, GrLivArea, TotRmsAbvGrd, SalePrice)


# Numeric maps (Higher # = better)

qual_map <- c("Ex" = 5,
              "Gd" = 4,
              "TA" = 3,
              "Fa" = 2,
              "Po" = 1)

electric_map <- c("SBrkr" = 5,
                  "FuseA" = 4,
                  "FuseF" = 3,
                  "FuseP" = 2,
                  "Mix" = 1)

building_map <- c("1Fam"   = 5,
                  "TwnhsE" = 4,
                  "Twnhs"  = 3,
                  "Duplex" = 2,
                  "2fmCon" = 1,
                  "Other"  = 0)


# Apply mapping
selected_numeric <- selected_var
selected_numeric$KitchenQual <- qual_map[selected_var$KitchenQual]
selected_numeric$ExterQual <- qual_map[selected_var$ExterQual]
selected_numeric$Electrical <- electric_map[selected_var$Electrical]
selected_numeric$BldgType <- building_map[selected_var$BldgType]

```
